entry.tran: (关系、行为等)出现障碍的,不正常的
entry.def: Dysfunctional is used to describe relationships or behaviour which are different from what is considered to be normal.

example.ex: ...the characteristics that typically occur in a dysfunctional family.
example.tran: 出现在缺陷家庭中的典型特征

means.word_mean: 1. impaired in function; especially of a bodily system or organ
2. (of a trait or condition) failing to serve an adjustive purpose;
